mutants.code:
def calculate_dangerous_triples(n, m, dislike_pairs, salary_revisions):
    L = [0] / n
    H = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    for (x, y) in dislike_pairs:
        x -= 1
        y -= 1
        if x > y:
            (x, y) = (y, x)
        L[y] += 1
        H[x].append(y)
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        ans += L[i] * len(H[i])
    result = [ans]
    for v in salary_revisions:
        v -= 1
        ans -= L[v] * len(H[v])
        L[v] += len(H[v])
        while H[v]:
            w = H[v].pop()
            H[w].append(v)
            L[w] -= 1
            ans += L[w] - len(H[w]) + 1
        result.append(ans)
    return result
